AddNeuronAnywhereMutationOperator - Class in com.anji.neat
Mutation operator that adds neurons anywhere in the network and connections it with two new connections, with the outgoing connection initially having a small weight value based on WeightMutationOperator.WEIGHT_MUTATE_STD_DEV_KEY.
